nodes.text: Tatakoz was a male Jawa Master Trader from the Mospic High Range on the planet Tatooine around the year 96 BBY. He had been cast out of his tribe and sold his goods from a speeder bike with a repulsor trailer. Individuals in the cities of Mos Espa and Mos Entha grew to appreciate Tatakoz's skill as a trader, which led several Jawa tribes to make an attempt to undercut his business. He eventually built and sold the first monster droid.
